articles.title: Travel news latest: Demand for summer holidays in Europe 'unabatedly high' - The Telegraph
articles.description: The world’s largest travel operator has reported demand for holidays in Europe is back to full strength, as travel restrictions across the continent ease.

articles.title: Blistering heat dome 'Lucifer' heads north to Portugal, into central Italy and towards Rome - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Saharan anticyclone, dubbed Lucifer, is just the latest in a bout of extreme weather in Europe after flash floods hit northern Turkey on Wednesday as wildfires continued to burn in Greece and Italy.
articles.content:

articles.title: Italy may have hit Europe's hottest day on record as anticyclone 'Lucifer' sweeps in - CNN
articles.description: The city of Siracusa hit the blistering record Wednesday as a persistent heat wave around the Mediterranean in Europe and North Africa has contributed to some of the worst fires seen there in years.

articles.description: Moderna and BioNTech shares dropped sharply on Wednesday amid reports the European Union is looking into potential side effects from their COVID-19 vaccines.
